data.title: Santee Live Oak Indian School
data.publis: University of South Carolina Lancaster, Native American Studies Center
data.descri: During segregation in this school (also called Crane Pool Elementary) provided education to up to the 7th grade. It closed in 1966 and later served as Tribal Headquarters for the Santee Indian Organization, founded in 1976.
